summary: This is an FBI tip report from August 11, 2020, where an anonymous individual from Virginia Beach, VA, submits an online tip alleging she was a victim of Jeffrey Epstein at age 15 in the 2000s. The tipster describes being recruited by a friend and a man named 'Andy' for a massage that turned into a sexual encounter with a man resembling Epstein. She also describes Andy's subsequent involvement in prostitution involving Russian girls for rich men and asks the FBI several specific questions to verify her account.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the FBI tip; the tipster alleges she had a sexual encounter with him when she was 15 years old during a massage arranged by a man named Andy in Virginia Beach in the 2000s.

persons.name: Andy
persons.context: A man who, according to the tipster, arranged the massage encounter with Epstein. He later drove by the tipster's residence, asked if law enforcement was looking for him, claimed to be 'part of a thing with a powerful man,' and was involved in pimping out Russian girls for prostitution to rich men.

connections.description: Andy allegedly arranged a massage/sexual encounter between the tipster and a man she believes was Jeffrey Epstein. Andy later indicated he was 'part of a thing with a powerful man,' implying a connection to Epstein.
Andy recruited the tipster (then a minor) for a massage that led to a sexual encounter with Epstein. He later checked in with her about law enforcement interest.
The tipster alleges she was a 15-year-old victim of a sexual encounter with Jeffrey Epstein, arranged by Andy in Virginia Beach in the 2000s.

events.title: Alleged Sexual Encounter with Epstein
events.description: The tipster, then approximately 15 years old, was recruited by a friend and a man named Andy to give a massage for money. She entered a bedroom and gave a massage to a man she believes was Jeffrey Epstein, which proceeded to a sexual encounter. Money was exchanged afterward.

events.title: Andy's Follow-up and Warning
events.description: Months after the alleged encounter, Andy drove by the tipster's residence and asked if anyone in government or law enforcement was looking for him. He stated he was 'part of a thing with a powerful man' and needed to get out of town if they were.

keyFacts: An anonymous tipster alleges she was a victim of Jeffrey Epstein at age 15 in Virginia Beach, VA, in the 2000s, during a massage arranged by a man named Andy.

The tipster describes Andy as being involved in pimping out Russian girls for prostitution to rich men and that he later expressed concern about law enforcement looking for him due to his connection to a 'powerful man.'

The tipster asks the FBI specific questions to verify her account, including whether Epstein was in Virginia Beach in the 2000s, if he had Russian girls there, if he had a Virginia Beach address, and if the name 'Andy' appears in FBI files related to Epstein.
The FBI's internal assessment of the tip states the information 'was determined to be of no current lead value' and database queries (Sentinel, Guardian, DIVS) revealed zero results.
The document is an official FBI record of an online tip submitted via tips.fbi.gov on August 11, 2020, concerning child sex trafficking allegations against Jeffrey Epstein.
